examples: The food looks good.
Good wine can make a meal.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
This information is as good as gold.
"Your guess is as good as mine."
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is satisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng thỏa mãn

examples: Bad weather brought chaos to the utility companies.
Bad luck often brings good luck.
The bad weather brought famine.
Don’t use bad language.
Bad manners will get you nowhere.
words.defineEn: having a standard or quality that is unsatisfying
words.defineVi: có tiêu chuẩn hoặc chất lượng không thỏa mãn

examples: Travel broadens the mind.
The train traveled through beautiful countryside.
They travelled the highways and byways of Britain.
The news traveled across the country like lightning.
His travels brought him into contact with many famous artists.
words.defineEn: the act of going to a different place, usually a place that is far
words.defineVi: hành động đi đến một nơi khác, thường là một nơi xa

examples: Unfortunately, experience is the teacher of fools.
The team's new manager brings ten years' experience to the job.
That experience changed my life.
I had experienced the heaven on earth.
On the day of the wedding, Brown experienced cold feet.
words.defineEn: the skill and knowledge we gain from doing, feeling, or seeing things
words.defineVi: kỹ năng và kiến thức chúng ta có được từ việc làm, cảm nhận hoặc nhìn thấy mọi thứ

examples: These comments are horrible.
The footage from this is absolutely horrible.
Babies' got horrible taste!
But the grammar is horrible.
Because the relationship with Peach was horrible.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The news really made my day.
That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!
The contractor is really taking their time.
Your friend really talks a blue streak!
That DJ's voice really sets my teeth on edge.
words.defineEn: used to put emphasis on a statement
words.defineVi: được sử dụng để nhấn mạnh vào một tuyên bố

examples: These comments are horrible.
The footage from this is absolutely horrible.
Babies' got horrible taste!
But the grammar is horrible.
Because the relationship with Peach was horrible.
words.defineEn: extremely unpleasant, bad, or disagreeable
words.defineVi: cực kỳ khó chịu, xấu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: My knowledge of French is pretty basic.
The girls looked so pretty in their summer dresses.
The board meeting painted a pretty grim picture.
Those movie stars live pretty high off the hog.
Years of war have left their mark on these pretty islands.
words.defineEn: to a degree that is high but not very high
words.defineVi: ở mức độ cao nhưng không cao lắm

examples: The team took a terrible beating.
You've made a terrible mess of this job.
I had terrible butterflies before I gave that talk in Venice.
The situation was terrible, but like many politicians he was attracted by troubled waters.
The entire region has been in the grip of a terrible drought.
words.defineEn: very bad, disagreeable, or unpleasant
words.defineVi: rất xấu, khó chịu, hoặc khó chịu

examples: The other dogs were unfriendly, too.
He looked very unfriendly. '
And a lot of turtles are pretty unfriendly.
And as unfriendly a place as it seems, lots of life has evolved to survive here.
The environmentally unfriendly disposal of unsold and returned inventory has made big news.
words.defineEn: not kind or nice toward other people
words.defineVi: không tử tế hoặc tốt đẹp đối với người khác

examples: The taxi driver helped me with my luggage.
They had a bad hair day on their vacation, encountering unexpected weather, canceled plans, and lost luggage.
You brought your luggage.
The coachman took my luggage and called me to hurry up.
Whenever they went by plane, people searched them and their luggage, of course.
words.defineEn: suitcases, bags, etc. to keep one's clothes and other belongings while traveling
words.defineVi: vali, túi xách, v.v. để giữ quần áo và đồ đạc khác khi đi du lịch

examples: I have zero dollars in my wallet.
She has seventy dollars in her wallet.
She always carries a small purse to hold her keys and wallet.
Most people seem to have voted with their wallets rather than with their hearts.
If you want this issue on people's radar, you have to frame it as something that will impact their wallets.
words.defineEn: a pocket-sized, folding case that is used for storing paper money, coin money, credit cards, etc.
words.defineVi: một hộp gấp, có kích thước bỏ túi được sử dụng để đựng tiền giấy, tiền xu, thẻ tín dụng, v.v.

examples: The paneer curry smells amazing!
It’s amazing.
My mom is an amazing cook.
It is amazing really.
That's amazing Ralph.
words.defineEn: extremely surprising, particularly in a good way
words.defineVi: cực kỳ ngạc nhiên, đặc biệt là trong một cách tốt

examples: Danish Blue cheese is fantastic in vegetarian dishes.
The vibrant hue of damson makes it a fantastic ingredient for homemade fruit popsicles.
Take time by the forelock and accept that fantastic internship!
She told me that yeast extract is a fantastic seasoning substitute for reducing sodium in my meals.
All my friends agree that Gruyère is a fantastic melting cheese.
words.defineEn: extremely amazing and great
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The atmosphere was terrific.
"Trees are terrific!"
Their theories had a terrific run.
That sounds terrific.
You're terrific.
words.defineEn: extremely great and amazing
words.defineVi: cực kỳ tuyệt vời và tuyệt vời

examples: The old lady's cake wasn't wonderful
Doesn’t Rosie look wonderful?
Squash adds a wonderful texture and sweetness to curries.
Since the news broke I've received thousands of wonderful letters.
To my eye, Jake, you're the most wonderful man on the planet.
words.defineEn: very great and pleasant
words.defineVi: rất tuyệt vời và dễ chịu

examples: She's very friendly and very down to earth.
They had a friendly soccer match with their friends in the park.
He lived in a small town with friendly neighbors.
My roommate and I engaged in a friendly debate about the different ways to prepare mooli.
She approached him with a friendly smile, but she got the cold shoulder, as he turned away without a word.
words.defineEn: kind and nice toward other people
words.defineVi: tử tế và tốt đẹp đối với người khác

examples: The water feels warm.
Are you warm enough?
It's quite warm outside.
The afternoon sun casts a warm glow on the buildings and trees.
The season of summer brings warm weather and longer days.
words.defineEn: having a temperature that is high but not hot, especially in a way that is enjoyable and pleasant
words.defineVi: có nhiệt độ cao nhưng không nóng, đặc biệt là theo cách thú vị và dễ chịu

examples: Find a hobby.
After all, love will find a way.
Water will always find its own level.
She found a dirty stain on her favorite shirt.
The court found in her favor.
words.defineEn: to randomly discover someone or something, particularly in a way that is surprising or unexpected
words.defineVi: để khám phá ngẫu nhiên một ai đó hoặc một cái gì đó, đặc biệt là trong một cách đó là đáng ngạc nhiên hoặc bất ngờ

examples: to return a greeting.
Please return the completed form at your earliest convenience.
I am returned.
He did not return her love.
The stock market rally resulted in a fat return on investment for many investors.
words.defineEn: to go or come back to a person, place, or state
words.defineVi: để đi hoặc trở lại với một người, địa điểm, hoặc tiểu bang

examples: That shot lost him the championship.
lose that creep!
His carelessness lost him the job.
The government has lost control of the city.
The business is losing money.
words.defineEn: to not know the location of a thing or person and be unable to find it
words.defineVi: không biết vị trí của một vật hoặc người và không thể tìm thấy nó

examples: She stole the shoes from under the assistant's nose.
The thief stole into the house through an unlocked window.
The spy stole across the border under the cover of darkness.
This suit is a steal at $80.
They would never steal.
words.defineEn: to take something from someone or somewhere without permission or paying for it
words.defineVi: lấy thứ gì đó từ ai đó hoặc nơi nào đó mà không được phép hoặc trả tiền cho nó
